page_content:
50ABF Regional Managers 
of Safety and Security 
The Regional Managers of Safety and Security (RMSS) 
team is made up of 12 regional managers who oversee 
safety and security functions at all ABF Freight locations. 
This team is responsible for everything from service center/
equipment inspections to injury/accident investigations, road 
tests, safety award presentations, driver coaching and theft 
investigations.
